faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: PetMedia is a mobile app that facilitates pet adoption and allows you to share feeding/water points through a community map.
faq.a2: Yes, we implement security measures including identity verification, location privacy, and reporting suspicious activities.
faq.a3: Yes, adoption processes through PetMedia are completely free.
faq.q4: How do I add points to the map?
faq.a4: You can easily add new feeding/water points and update existing ones through the app.
faq.q5: Which cities are you active in?
faq.a5: We currently serve all cities in Turkey.
faq.q6: How do I get technical support?
faq.a6: You can reach us through the in-app support section or at info@petmedia.app.
